description:
Built on the relaxed geometry of Cannondale’s Adventure frame, and equipped with a suspension fork and suspension seat post, this bike will have you cruising in comfort. The Adventure 1’s effortless riding position lets you save your energy for the hills. When you do hit those inevitable inclines, the microSHIFT groupset gives you plenty of mechanical advantage to take the edge off. And the powerful hydraulic disc brakes let you keep your speed right where you want it.

  • Smartform C3 alloy frame with a lower step-through and relaxed geometry
  • Suntour NEX suspension fork with 50mm of travel
  • 8-speed drivetrain pairs a 38T chain ring with a 12-42T cassette
  • microSHIFT groupset with a Prowheel crank
  • Tektro hydraulic disc brakes
  • Double-wall alloy rims
  • Wide, ergonomic seat mounted atop a suspension seat post absorbs road vibration
  • Easy rolling Goodyear Transit Tour tires are smooth rolling and have great all-weather traction
  • Kickstand saves you from looking for things to lean your bike against
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for a year after purchase
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
name: Cannondale Adventure 1 Bicycle - Unisex
